data.name: Curvatron - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The soundtrack for Curvatron was provided by people all over the world completely free of charge. This is an organized compilation of their work.

  • 01 - unnq - je t'aime, tue me manques
  • 02 - LPChip - Curvature
  • 03 - The Amplified Apple - Maple
  • 04 - VIAES - Decembrr
  • 05 - James Magnum - Esplanade
  • 06 - Chain Reaction - Something To Live For
  • 07 - Face Of Bear - Delta
  • 08 - Kasse - Mellow
  • 09 - Benedikt - Looking For Pluto
  • 10 - Maximus Quackhandle - Afterglow
  • 11 - Eli G and WPH - Fever Dream
  • 12 - Drug Dealer - What The Night Did To You
  • 13 - O.J.B - Synthetic Popz
  • 14 - Walrus Tales - Preamble (L)
  • 15 - Inside People - Good News
  • 16 - Ishan S - Tone Town
  • 17 - Hybrid Junkie - Pleasantville
  • 18 - K-o-m-o-d-o - Julia's Song
  • 19 - Ray AB - Suburban Lunacy
  • 20 - Hanray - Black Dog
  • 21 - Steven Danglis - Aug14-2008
  • 22 - James S. Reid - Yosemite
  • 23 - tobi - the overview of space
  • 24 - Heat Legend - Patter
  • 25 - Lachy - Incandescence
  • 26 - Ry JT - Yna
  • 27 - ShiggyBeatz - No Memory
  • 28 - Slowowls - Short Journey Home
  • 29 - Signal-to-Noise - Firebox
  • 30 - ephen - orgone vapors
  • 31 - Attik-Attak - Inertia Jungle
  • 32 - Ray AB - Suburban Lunacy
  • 33 - Rick Sparks - whereknow
  • 34 - Adeus Senhor F. - Courting for Puss
  • 35 - Tim Gerwing - Geometry
  • 36 - Kode of Bliss - Trauma and Torment of Truth

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: As long as it plays ogg files
  • Processor: I mean
  • Graphics: You don't even need one, except if you wanna see those trippy Windows Media Player effects
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Defnitely
